Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Southbound Reroute near Wentworth/29th
ShortDescription: Southbound 24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Wentworth, 26th, Canal, 29th, Canal, 31st and Wentworth, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Wentworth, 26th, Canal, 29th, Canal, 31st and Wentworth, due to street blockage near Wentworth/29th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays from the area of Jefferson Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays from the area of Jefferson Park.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
